msg: Need to properly namespace the php class names in typespec

author: mcslee
msg: Summary: Chopping the amount of code generated by Thrift for PHP services by two orders of magnitude (approx 25% of the previous size). This is done via putting more logic in a dynamic base class and taking it out of the generated code. Hopefully this wins back the CPU cycles paid just to load code from APC at the cost of a marginal increase in dynamic execution runtime.
Test Plan: Ran all the tests in trunk/test/php, also tested the API generate code and Falcon, etc. in my sandbox

author: dreiss
msg: Also updated the CONTRIBUTORS file.  Sorry, Boz.
